body_html:
@ chenzhekl I think you are right. The inputs are probably distorted after view. I will check later.
...............................................................................
I test it and this is indeed the problem, view is not the equivalent of transpose in tensorflow. View in here simply create a new tensor and copy paste everything from the original tensor. Lesson learned

body:
@ chenzhekl I think you are right. The inputs are probably distorted after view. I will check later.
...............................................................................
I test it and this is indeed the problem, view is not the equivalent of transpose in tensorflow. View in here simply create a new tensor and copy paste everything from the original tensor. Lesson learned
